subject: Volleyball
lead_paragraph: Trentino of Italy clinched its fourth consecutive world club championship after crushing Sada Cruzeiro of Brazil, 3-0, in the final of the FIVB Club World Championships in Doha, Qatar.
snippet: Trentino of Italy clinched its fourth consecutive world club championship after crushing Sada Cruzeiro of Brazil, 3-0, in the final of the FIVB Club World Championships in Doha, Qatar.
